text: <@UDDJG2VFG> I keep getting a 400 error when trying to pass the vehicle information that are not fields in the form. Any idea why? Example contact and error attached

Hello Zack.
When a lead signup for our solution, it get converted to a customer and we push back a customer ID to the HubSpot contact in order to link them (as a custom field)

We would like to be able to get the HubSpot contact based on the customer ID so we can push more information to it. For example, when the customer pays for the subscription and become a paying customer.
By getting the contact based on his customer ID, we could update his information in HubSpot.

Thanks

Hey, <@UEZJ74UN8>! We just chatted via DM, but the fields will have to be part of some form, whether they’re hidden fields in the customer-facing form or stored in a second form that’s just used on the back end to pass the information you retrieve from the external database.
That’s really helpful thanks.  We’ve talked about adding the ability to create your custom identifiers before but haven’t really started on that.  I’ll add this use case to our internal tracker
